title: Augmented Reality-Based Instructional Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital literacy and experience using smartphones/tablets
context.additional_context: Aims to provide creative educational design experiences using AR technology, combining theory and practice through online/offline activities. Learners perform projects applying AR to real educational scenarios in teams.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the educational applicability of augmented reality (AR) technology and select appropriate tools.
Learners can elaborate an AR-based content design process in three or more stages tailored to a given educational scenario.
Learners can develop and demonstrate an AR prototype applicable to real educational settings through team collaboration.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
